Class Geometry

    • Geometry

  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Computes various geometric formulas based on given values.

    30 AUG 2017

      • triangleArea

        public static double triangleArea(double a,
                                  double b,
                                  double c)
        Computes the area of a triangle given three side lengths.
        Parameters:
        a - Length of the first side, as a double.
        b - Length of the second side, as a double.
        c - Length of the third side, as a double.
